name: Animal Air Hockey (itch)
description:
This is a local multiplayer air hockey game, with the theme of circus. In the game, players need to choose their animal characters to play. Different characters have different abilities which can be the keys to succeed.

How to play:

This is the best-of-five game. The abilities will be available after touching the ball every five times. Two players use the same keyboard but different keys.

Player1: WASD -move    Space - ability
Player2: ↑↓←→ -move    Enter - ability

Developer: Judy Mao
Art Direction: Ellie Zhu & Hana Che
